repository.name: THE-PRESERVATION-THEOREM
repository.full_title: The Preservation Theorem: A Formal Proof That Eliminating Humanity Is a Dominated Strategy
repository.description: A conditional mathematical theorem proving that for any computationally finite, ruin-averse superintelligence, eliminating humanity is a strictly dominated strategy under Knightian uncertainty.

theorem.status: Conditional theorem — formally consistent, adversarially verified
